short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Another new tab extension which synchronises your notes across devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple replacement for your new-tab page allows you to take notes that are synced across devices.

Options (top-right corner icon):
- Container width: Sets the maximum width of the interface.
- Hide stand-up section: Keep only the notes pane open.
- Stand-up section height: Sets the height of the stand-up section (if enabled).
